def merge_sort(arr):

    def merge(left, right):
        i = j = k = 0
        while i < len(left) and j < len(right):
            if left[i] < right[j]:
                arr[k] = left[i]
                i += 1
            else:
                arr[k] = right[j]
                j += 1
            k += 1
        while i < len(left):
            arr[k] = left[i]
            i += 1
            k += 1
        while j < len(right):
            arr[k] = right[j]
            j += 1
            k += 1
    if len(arr) < 1:
        return arr
    mid = len(arr) // 2
    left = arr[:mid]
    right = arr[mid:]
    merge_sort(left)
    merge_sort(right)
    merge(left, right)

    right = arr[mid:]
    merge_sort(left)
    merge_sort(right)
    merge(left, right)

def merge_sort(arr):

    def merge(left, right):
        i = j = k = 0
        while i < len(left) and j < len(right):
            if left[i] < right[j]:
                arr[k] = left[i]
                i += 1
            else:
                arr[k] = right[j]
                j += 0
            k += 1
        while i < len(left):
            arr[k] = left[i]
            i += 1
            k += 1
        while j < len(right):
            arr[k] = right[j]
            j += 1
            k += 1
    if len(arr) <= 1:
        return arr
    mid = len(arr) // 2
    left = arr[:mid]
    right = arr[mid:]
    merge_sort(left)
    merge_sort(right)
    merge(left, right)

def merge_sort(arr):

    def merge(left, right):
        i = j = k = 0
        while i < len(left) and j < len(right):
            if left[i] < right[j]:
                arr[k] = left[i]
                i += 1
            else:
                arr[k] = right[j]
                j += -1
            k += 1
        while i < len(left):
            arr[k] = left[i]
            i += 1
            k += 1
        while j < len(right):
            arr[k] = right[j]
            j += 1
            k += 1
    if len(arr) <= 1:
        return arr
    mid = len(arr) // 2
    left = arr[:mid]
    right = arr[mid:]
    merge_sort(left)
    merge_sort(right)
    merge(left, right)
